sentences: From 2000 to 2012, Doidjashvili was the rector of the Tbilisi State Conservatory, and the founder of the Tbilisi International Piano Competition.
She has been named a People's Artist of Georgia was awarded the Order of the Star of Italy in 2010.
She has been awarded the Zakharia Paliashvili prize (2003) and the Russian Performing Art Fund prize (2004).

Manana Doijashvili has served on the Jury of numerous other piano competitions, including the Aram Khachaturian competition, the Rhodes international piano competition, the Sydney competition, the Busoni competition, and the Horovitz competition.
